Module.Content:
<script src="http://www.json.org/json2.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <script src="http://pmrpc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/pmrpc.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
    
      function startIframe() {
             
        // test1
        pmrpc.register("test1", function() {alert("1");});
        
        // test2
        pmrpc.register("test2", function(echo) {return echo;});
        
        // test3
        pmrpc.register("test3", function() {});
        
        // test4
        pmrpc.register("test4_unregistered", function() {});
        
        // test6
        pmrpc.register("test6", function() {});
        
        // test7
        pmrpc.register("test7", function() {});
        
        // test8
        pmrpc.register("test8", function() {}, {whitelist: ["http://pmrpc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/*","file://*"], blacklist:[]});
        
        // test9
        pmrpc.register("test9", function() {}, {whitelist: ["http://pmrpc.googlecode.com/*", "file://*"], blacklist:["http://pmrpc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/*", "file*"]});
        
        // test10
        pmrpc.register("test10", function() {}, {whitelist: ["http://www.fail.com*"], blacklist:[]});
      }
    
    _IG_RegisterOnloadHandler(startIframe);
    
    </script>
